channel.title: gpt-4 on Niels Berglund
channel.description: Recent content in gpt-4 on Niels Berglund

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 12, 2023
item.description: Not so much to cover this week. What you find in this post is a couple of links to posts about building customised chatbots based on GPT-4. There is also an interesting link to how to use Kafka and FastAPI to develop a realtime ticketing booking solution.
